Sentencas: A model based on random packing of electron and ion conductor particles is developed to study the microstructure performance relationship of solid oxide fuel cell electrodes.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: This three-dimensional model takes into account special variations of triple phase boundary (TPB) by keeping track of all particles in the packing.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: Porosity of the media can be controlled and is set to 30%.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: Effect of particle size, electrode thickness, electrode composition and particle size ratio on the length of TPB line has been studied.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: The study shows that unlike what models based on percolation theory suggest, the electrode media is not homogeneous for electrochemical reaction.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: While increasing the thickness increases the length of the TPB to some extent, beyond that little or no improvement was observed.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: The study also revealed that adding a current collector layer made of electron conductors can increase the TPB line by at least 4%.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Sentencas: While for particles of the same size maximum length of TPB was observed at equal volume percent of electron and ion conductor particles, for size ratio of particles other than one the maximum TPB tends to occur above or below 50% depending on the size ratio.
Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes

Titulo: Geometrical modeling of microstructure of solid oxide fuel cell composite electrodes
